articles.title: Biggest WWE event since ‘Wrestlemania’ coming to Michigan for 1st time in 30 years - MLive.com
articles.description: It's been 30 years since this event was in Michigan and there has not been a bigger wrestling event in the state since Wrestlemania 23.
articles.content: DETROIT - Wrestling history is about to me made again in Michigan. The biggest professional wrestling event since Wrestlemania 23 is coming to the state later this year with the announcement of WWEs … [+1490 chars]
